category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat, resolves toxicity, drains abscesses and swellings and expels pus

indications: Early stages of sores and abscesses when they are red, swollen and painful
Especially for swelling and pain in the breast area
Encourages lactation, especially when there are signs of Heat

contraindications: Do not use for insufficient lactation due to Deficiency.

useCases: Acute stage of abscesses with redness, swelling, Heat and pain.
Promotes lactation due to Qi Stagnation transforming into Heat.
Breast abscess with pus that has ruptured.
Breast abscess without pus that has not ruptured.
Insufficient milk production or obstruction of milk flow due to Heat.
